content: olympian socks designed by emm1e sockapalooza4pal@gmail com i doubt that many of us will be in china watching the olympics in person much less participating directly hopefully these socks will help us all feel like part of the competition while we watch on tv ribbed socks with a coin lace pattern that looks like row of medals and a cuff detail that looks like greek columns mean that everyone feels like a winner materials and equipment 1 100 gram skein or two 50 gram skeins of fingering weight yarn i used claudia hand painted in silver shimmer us size 1 circular needles or size to obtain gauge pattern is written for 2 circulars but should be easily converted to magic loop or dpns tapestry needle gauge 7 8 stitches per inch working 8 stitches per inch is good if you have feet smaller than 8 diameter if your feet measure more than 9 in diameter you might want to modify this pattern so that you cast on 70 stitches it is a stretchy pattern abbreviations k knit k2tog knit two together m1 increase one by lifting a thread from the previous row and knitting it n1 or n2 needle 1 or needle 2 p purl psso2 pass slipped stitch over 2 knit stitches sl slip a stitch purlwise ssk slip a stitch knitwise twice then knit both stitches together yo- yarn over medal rib and lace pattern worked over 10 stitches and 4 row row 1 *k3 p2 sl 1 k2 psso2 p2* repeat to end of row row 2 *k3 p2 k1 yo k1 p2* repeat to end of row row 3 and 4 *k3 p2* repeat to end of row cast on 60 stitches loosely using your favorite cast on put 30 stitches on n1 and 30 on n2 from now on n1 holds the sole stitches and n2 holds the instep stitches join being careful not to twist cuff work in k3 p2 rib for 12 row row 13 purl all stitches row 14 knit all stitches row 15 purl all stitches leg repeat medal rib and lace pattern 15 times plus one extra row 1 heel set up row1 p3 k3 m1 k9 m1 k9 m1 k3 then knit the first 3 stitches from n2 onto n1 you end up with 33 stitches on n1 and 24 on n2 hint when you do the m1 lift the back of the stitch you passed over in row 1 of pattern and knit into the back loop heel set up row 2 turn sock so you are still working on n1 k3 purl to end of row heel flap worked on n1 this is an eye of partridge heel with a garter edge for you pros row 1 p3 sl1 k1 repeat across until the last 3 stitches k3 turn row 2 k3 purl to end of row turn row 3 p3 k1 sl1 repeat across
